text.p: These are some of the leading stories in Kuwait's press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Kuwait says it will purchase sophisticated weapons to modernise armed forces.
- U.S. source says time not right yet for contacts with Iraq.
- Gulf Investment Corporation says it has set up a fund with a 50 million German mark capital.
- Kuwait-U.S. trade in 1995 put at $1 billion, Commerce ministry official says.
- Defence minister says Kuwait to erect an electric fence along border with Iraq to deter infiltrators.
